description: These vegan burritos are packed with all the ultimate ingredients. Fill them how you want and change them up every time to keep it exciting!
keywords: healthy burrito recipe, kid friendly dinners
name: Ultimate Vegan Burritos Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 cup lentil walnut taco meat (, or any other taco meat you prefer (see note)
1 cup black beans (, homemade or store bought)
1 cup Mexican rice (, or use any rice you prefer)
4 burrito sized tortillas (, gluten-free if needed)

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and heating in the microwave for 30-45 seconds. Keep heating in 15 second increments to get them soft and pliable.
Fill with ingredients of choice, we used 1/2 cup taco meat, 1/4 cup beans and 1/4 cup rice. Then topped with all the fixings.
Fold in the sides, then bring the bottom over the top of the ingredients and tuck around them tight as you roll the burrito closed.

Place seam side down on a heated pan over medium low and grill for about 3-5 minutes until the edge is sealed. This helps make eating the burrito easier so it doesnâ€™t fall apart, and also gives some great texture.
Enjoy! I like to drizzle sauce over the top sometimes too.
